sqlReaderQuery.value: select watermarkvalue from table_injestion_monitor where Table_Name=  '@{pipeline().parameters.TABLE_NAME}' and tenant='@{pipeline().parameters.Tenant}'

@coalesce( pipeline().parameters.lookupnewwatermark, replace(replace(pipeline().parameters.copyquery, '@tenant', pipeline().parameters.Tenant) ,
'a.*', concat( 'MAX(a.' , pipeline().parameters.WaterMark_Column, ') as NewWatermarkvalue')))

@if(equals(pipeline().parameters.Tenant_Column,''),concat( pipeline().parameters.copyquery,' where a.', pipeline().parameters.WaterMark_Column, ' > ', pipeline().parameters.quote_single, activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.watermarkvalue, pipeline().parameters.quote_single, ' and a.', pipeline().parameters.WaterMark_Column, ' <= ', pipeline().parameters.quote_single, activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue, pipeline().parameters.quote_single, ';' ),concat( if(equals(pipeline().parameters.source_name,'source2'),replace(pipeline().parameters.copyquery, '@tenant', pipeline().parameters.gc_tenant),replace(pipeline().parameters.copyquery, '@tenant', pipeline().parameters.Tenant)) ,  ' and a.', pipeline().parameters.WaterMark_Column, ' > ', pipeline().parameters.quote_single, activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.watermarkvalue, pipeline().parameters.quote_single, ' and a.', pipeline().parameters.WaterMark_Column, ' <= ', pipeline().parameters.quote_single, activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue, pipeline().parameters.quote_single, ';' ))

sqlReaderQuery.value: select  JSON_VALUE(source_credentials_json, '$.server_name') as server_name, JSON_VALUE(source_credentials_json, '$.database_name') as database_name,JSON_VALUE(source_credentials_json, '$.username') as username, JSON_VALUE(source_credentials_json, '$.password') as password from source_master where instance_id='@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}' and source_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_name}'

select a.table_name, a.watermark_column, a.uid_column as primary_column, 
a.copyquery, a.table_name as sink_table_name, a.precopycleanup as precopycleanup, a.lookupnewwatermark as lookupnewwatermark
from table_master a
INNER JOIN table_injestion_monitor b  ON a.table_name = b.table_name  WHERE b.RUNID = '@{pipeline().RunId}' and b.source_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_name}' and a.SOR = '@{pipeline().parameters.SOR}' ;

select a.table_name, a.watermark_column, a.uid_column as primary_column, 
a.copyquery, a.table_name as sink_table_name, a.precopycleanup as precopycleanup, a.lookupnewwatermark as lookupnewwatermark

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select a.table_name, 
a.watermark_column,a.tenant_column, a.isdeltaallowed, 
a.copyquery,
a.upsertquery,
a.lookupnewwatermark as lookupnewwatermark
from table_master a
INNER JOIN table_injestion_monitor b  ON a.table_name = b.table_name 
WHERE b.RUNID = '@{pipeline().RunId}' and b.source_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_name}' and a.SOR = '@{pipeline().parameters.SOR}' ;

sqlReaderQuery.value: @replace(variables('runQuery'),'@RunID',pipeline().RunId)

@concat('select url,to_email,from_email from function_urls where function_name=',variables('single_quote'),'func-di-emailNotification',variables('single_quote'),' and env=',variables('single_quote'),pipeline().parameters.environment,variables('single_quote'))

runQuery.defaultValue:
declare @val varchar(max) = ''; select @val = COALESCE(@val,'') + ' JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.rowsCopied') then ' style=color:red' else '' end + ' >'+table_name+''+tenant+''+ source_name+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal,'$.rowsRead')+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.rowsCopied')+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.copyDuration')+''+status+'' from (select table_name,tenant,status,case source_name when 'source1' then 'SUMMIT-SQL' when 'source2' then 'GOLDEN-CATALOG' when 'source3' then 'CINDE-SQL' end as source_name,replace(replace(replace([message],'copy pipeline',''),'Success',''),'Error','') as jsonVal from table_injestion_monitor where RunID='@RunID' ) t; select '

Below are the stats of Data Integration Pipeline Run Activity:


' + @val + '
TableNameTenantNameSourceNameRowsRead from sourceRowsCopied to TargetCopyDuration (sec)Status

Note: Please do not reply to this email.

'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select a.table_name, 
a.watermark_column,a.tenant_column, a.isdeltaallowed, 
a.copyquery,
a.upsertquery,
a.lookupnewwatermark as lookupnewwatermark
from table_master a
INNER JOIN table_injestion_monitor b  ON a.table_name = b.table_name 
WHERE b.RUNID = '@{pipeline().RunId}' and b.source_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_name}' and a.SOR = '@{pipeline().parameters.SOR}' ;

value.value: @concat( 'DELETE FROM ', item().SINK_TABLE_NAME, ' where ', item().primary_column, ' IN ( ', replace( concat( item().SelectQueryTenant, pipeline().parameters.singleQuote, pipeline().parameters.tenant, pipeline().parameters.singleQuote) , '*', item().primary_column ), ' );' )

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select a.table_name, a.watermark_column, 
a.SA_Structure as structure, a.SA_jsonPathExpression as jsonPathDefinition,  a.SelectQueryTenant, 
a.uid_column as primary_column, 
c.SINK_TABLE_NAME
from table_master a
INNER JOIN table_injestion_monitor b  ON a.table_name = b.table_name 
INNER JOIN table_tenant_mapping_variables c ON  c.tenant = b.tenant AND c.table_name = b.table_name
WHERE b.RUNID = '@{pipeline().RunId}';
select sink_username, sink_password, sys_username, sys_password from instance_master where instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'
select sink_username, sink_password, sys_username, sys_password from instance_master where instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'
select Tenant,source_name,SOR from Tenant_master where status = 'ACTIVE'
select onpremise_df from source_master where source_name = '@{item().source_name}' and instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'
select sink_username, sink_password, sys_username, sys_password from instance_master where instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'

select onpremise_df from source_master where source_name = '@{item().source_name}' and instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'
select sink_username, sink_password, sys_username, sys_password from instance_master where instance_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}'
@replace(variables('runQuery'),'@RunID',pipeline().RunId)

@concat('select url,to_email,from_email from function_urls where function_name=',variables('single_quote'),'func-di-emailNotification',variables('single_quote'),' and env=',variables('single_quote'),pipeline().parameters.environment,variables('single_quote'))

declare @val varchar(max) = ''; select @val = COALESCE(@val,'') + ' JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.rowsCopied') then ' style=color:red' else '' end + ' >'+table_name+''+tenant+''+ source_name+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal,'$.rowsRead')+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.rowsCopied')+''+JSON_VALUE(jsonVal, '$.copyDuration')+''+status+'' from (select table_name,tenant,status,case source_name when 'source1' then 'SUMMIT-SQL' when 'source2' then 'GOLDEN-CATALOG' when 'source3' then 'CINDE-SQL' end as source_name,replace(replace(replace([message],'copy pipeline',''),'Success',''),'Error','') as jsonVal from table_injestion_monitor where RunID='@RunID' ) t; select '

Below are the stats of Data Integration Pipeline Run Activity:

source.sqlReaderQuery: select Tenant from Tenant_master where status = 'ACTIVE' and sor='SUMMIT-API'

sqlReaderQuery.value: select sink_username, sink_password, sys_username, sys_password  from instance_master where instance_id = @{pipeline().parameters.Instance_ID}

select a.table_name,
a.watermark_column, c.temp_table,
a.SelectQueryTenant as TenantWiseSelectRows , 
StoredProcedureNameForUpsertOperation, SA_jsonPathExpression ,
SA_Structure as structure,  c.sink_table_name 
from table_master a
INNER JOIN table_injestion_monitor b ON a.table_name = b.table_name 
INNER JOIN table_tenant_mapping_variables c ON  c.tenant = b.tenant AND c.table_name = b.table_name
WHERE b.RUNID = '@{pipeline().RunId}';
